name: Cook's Assistant
Start point: Cook in the Lumbridge Castle kitchen.
Description: The Duke of Lumbridge is having a birthday party, but his Cook has forgotten to buy the ingredients for the cake. He needs your help to retrieve them.

substeps: Talk to the Cook in the kitchen on the ground floor[UK]1st floor[US] of Lumbridge Castle.
Agree to help him find the ingredients for the Duke's birthday cake.
Pick up a Pot from the table in the Lumbridge Castle kitchen if you don't have one.
Go to the wheat field north-west of Lumbridge, just west of the windmill.
Use the Wheat on the hopper.
Climb down to the ground floor[UK]1st floor[US].
Use your empty Pot on the flour bin to collect the flour.
Pick up a Bucket if you don't have one.
Go to the cow field east of the Lumbridge windmill.
Use the Bucket on a cow to get a Bucket of milk.
Go to Fred the Farmer's farm north-east of Lumbridge (across the river).
Pick up an Egg from inside the chicken coop.
Return to the Cook in Lumbridge Castle with the Supergrain flour, Bucket of milk, and Egg.
Give him the ingredients to complete the quest.
